title: Jackie Cain & Roy Kral - A Wilder Alias (1973) CTI
description:
JACKIE & ROY - A WILDER ALIAS

1. A Wilder Alias (Roy Kral)
2. Niki's Song (Jackie Cain - Roy Kral)
3. Waltz For Dana (Roy Kral)
4. The Way We Are (Roy Kral)
5. Good And Rich (Roy Kral - Richard Druz)

Jackie Cain - vocal
Roy Kral - piano (electric) & vocal
Harvie Swartz - bass
Steve Gadd - drums
Roy Pennington - vibes
Hubert Laws - flute
Joe Farell - tenor & soprano sax

Recorded at Van Gelder Studios, December, 1973

2011 CTI

This album should be of interest to all Zappa aficionados and 70's jazz-rock fusion consumers. I suspect that this album was a big influence on Zappa, but it could also be the other way around.
"Niki's Song" (later redone as "Full Moon" on the magnificent "The Beautiful Sea") is the only with lyrics. The rest are in vocalese
